ygData.subject: RE: Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: Grifeene s are pretty easy - maybe 1 in 10 drop the charm.  Maybe 1 in 20? Not too bad. I always had ranger or druid or bard friends helping me.  Don t get
ygData.messageBody:
Grifeene's are pretty easy - maybe 1 in 10 drop the charm. Maybe 1 in 20?
Not too bad. I always had ranger or druid or bard friends helping me. Don't
get snarfed by Grimfeather! Mudwater runes - I got mine in the normal course
of CT fighting - at like level 32 to 34ish.

The DW Gobbies presented more of a problem though. Saw one at half health
and tried to take it with a SK friend - we were both lo 30's and we both
died. My friends got to be lo 40's and were hunting spec's in Oasis and
figured out how to pull or where to pull DW gobs and called me over. We
killed at least 20 before we got a helm and they quit for bigger game. I
was like 35/36 when we got the helm.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@...
[mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Monday, November 22, 1999 8:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent

From: John_Senior@...

Hiya all,

just thought I'd let you all know how my Lambent armor
questing has been
going..........

I've got the Dark boned Bracelet so far, but how hard are
the Grif charms
and the stuff for the helm to get?? I've never been to Cazic
btw.
